name: Cursed (itch) (MickkMeng)
description:
The aspiration is from a flash game published by Sony for advertising Ju-on,the movie, I have made the entire story as a loop circle which means that you are under a curse and will never escape the house, just like the concept of Ju-on.

The player will be the main character in the game and solve the puzzles in each scene according to the hints given.

A and L are two buttons you can use, in addition, try to press them together to see what will happen.Better experience with earpieces.

(For the Chessplaying scene, A+L is to reset the chess position and start again. )
